amendment.description: To add the Select Committee on Intelligence and the Committee on Foreign Relations of the Senate and the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence and the Committee on Foreign Affairs of the House of Representatives to the list of congressional committees to receive the submission of reports on the program for scientific engagement for nonproliferation.

action.text: Amendment SA 3213 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Risch.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3213 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
